name: Cold Cross Pocket
description:
Cold Cross Pocket

After living on top of Odosobnione Mountain for most of their life, help Chicy find a route down the mountain to escape their isolation. Explore the summit of Odosobnione Mountain to learn more about Chicy's life and, hopefully, find a way back to civilization in this short GameBoy Demo!

Collect Items!

Unlock access to the Cable Car Stations and find Batteries to power it back up. The batteries are lost all across the summit, so it's up to you to find them! Or you can listen to the Cable Car Station jingle and stay on the summit.

Explore Odosobnione Mountain!

Explore the many locations on top of Odosobnione Mountain. Plunge deep into the icy caves of Hoseki Cave and Sutaraito Cave and wade through the dense trees of Nocturno Forest.

Cold Cross Pocket OST

Coming Soon!
